content: silly frenchie hat by angela shaver this isn t really a pattern but more of a guideline for making this hat stitches used mc magic_ring slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet dcfp double_crochet in the front post dcbp double_crochet in the back post cr crab stitch you can use any yarn and hook i used a hook that was a bit small for the yarn it makes the ears stand up better ears mc 6sc in mc pull closed this section is worked in a spiral with no joins 2sc in the next stitch 2sc repeat 8 stitches 2sc in the next stitch 3sc repeat 10 stitches 2sc in the next stitch 4sc repeat 12 stitches 2sc in the next stitch 5sc repeat 14 stitches 2sc in the next stitch 6sc repeat 16 stitches 2sc in the next stitch 7sc repeat 18 stitches 2sc in the next stitch 8sc repeat 20 stitches 2sc in the next stitch 9sc repeat 22 stitches 2sc in the next stitch 10sc repeat 24 stitches single_crochet in each stitch around 24 stitches i repeated this row 5 times for a total of 120 stitches if your dog s ears are longer or shorter adjust accordingly slip_stitch in the last stitch cut yarn and weave in end make a second ear cone but do not tie off top of hat using the second cone single_crochet in the next 9 stitches chain 1 turn single_crochet in each stitch across 9stitches ch1 turn repeat for about 2 inches to size this section i placed the cones on my dog s ears and measured the space in between once you have a long enough strip slip_stitch to the first cone single_crochet around the cone in the side of each single_crochet in the top strip around the next cone and in each single_crochet of the other side of the head strap ending at the end of the slip_stitch repeat this row one time tie off and cut yarn chin strap attach yarn on one of the ear cones about 5 or so stitches away from the last tie off 9sc chain and turn repeat until strap is long enough to go under the chin slip_stitch to the other cone in about the same place single_crochet around hole where the chin strap joins the ears i single crocheted 2 together to give it a little shape around the face then do one row of single_crochet next row is one row of crab stitch if you don t do crab stitch single_crochet will work fine slip_stitch to join cut yarn neck ribbing attach yarn on the other side of the hat chain 2 double_crochet around try to get an even number if not just fudge it dogs don t care slip_stitch to join chain 2 fpdc bpdc repeat to the end of the row slip_stitch to join chain 2 fpdc in the first fpdc bpdc in the next bpdc repeat around slip_stitch to join repeat last row chain 1 single_crochet
